title: TTT Batch 2: Congressional Oversight Obstruction and Subpoena Defiance
description: Systematic analysis of congressional oversight obstruction and subpoena defiance operations based on Trump Tyranny Tracker documentation. Found 17 instances across articles 46-90. Research subpoena defiance strategies, testimony obstruction, contempt proceedings, executive privilege claims, and congressional oversight undermining. Focus on specific cases, targeted investigations, and obstruction coordination.
